WorkItem.Description:
With the new api, the EntityReference node is more complex and has this format.

<a:KeyValuePairOfstringanyType>
                      <b:key>rd_account</b:key>
                      <b:value i:type="a:EntityReference">
                        <a:Id>495fcdfd-8af2-e411-80f3-c4346bacfd94</a:Id>
                        <a:KeyAttributes xmlns:c="http://schemas.microsoft.com/xrm/7.1/Contracts"/>
                        <a:LogicalName>account</a:LogicalName>
                        <a:Name>ABC Broker</a:Name>
                        <a:RowVersion i:nil="true"/>
                      </b:value>
                    </a:KeyValuePairOfstringanyType>

so the Name is at position 3 and the logical name is at position 2.

to retrieve entity reference, XrmServiceToolkit.Soap.Fetch
The code should be adapted to use the node name instead of an index...
